EcrConfiguration.description: Settings for Image Builder to configure the ECR repository and output container images that are scanned.

properties.name: ContainerTags
properties.description: Tags for Image Builder to apply the output container image that is scanned. Tags can help you identify and manage your scanned images.

type.description: Tags for Image Builder to apply the output container image that is scanned. Tags can help you identify and manage your scanned images.

properties.name: RepositoryName
properties.description: The name of the container repository that Amazon Inspector scans to identify findings for your container images. The name includes the path for the repository location. If you don’t provide this information, Image Builder creates a repository in your account named image-builder-image-scanning-repository to use for vulnerability scans for your output container images.

type.description: The name of the container repository that Amazon Inspector scans to identify findings for your container images. The name includes the path for the repository location. If you don’t provide this information, Image Builder creates a repository in your account named image-builder-image-scanning-repository to use for vulnerability scans for your output container images.

ImageScanningConfiguration.description: Contains settings for Image Builder image resource and container image scans.

properties.name: EcrConfiguration
properties.description: Contains ECR settings for vulnerability scans.

type.description: Contains ECR settings for vulnerability scans.

properties.name: ImageScanningEnabled
properties.description: This sets whether Image Builder keeps a snapshot of the vulnerability scans that Amazon Inspector runs against the build instance when you create a new image.

type.description: This sets whether Image Builder keeps a snapshot of the vulnerability scans that Amazon Inspector runs against the build instance when you create a new image.

ImageTestsConfiguration.description: The image tests configuration used when creating this image.

properties.name: ContainerRecipeArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe that defines how images are configured and tested.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe that defines how images are configured and tested.

properties.name: DistributionConfigurationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration.

properties.name: EnhancedImageMetadataEnabled
properties.description: Collects additional information about the image being created, including the operating system (OS) version and package list.

type.description: Collects additional information about the image being created, including the operating system (OS) version and package list.

properties.name: ImageRecipeArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe that defines how images are configured, tested, and assessed.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe that defines how images are configured, tested, and assessed.

properties.name: ImageTestsConfiguration
properties.description: The image tests configuration used when creating this image.

type.description: The image tests configuration used when creating this image.

properties.name: InfrastructureConfigurationArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the infrastructure configuration.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the infrastructure configuration.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags associated with the image.

type.description: The tags associated with the image.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.

properties.name: ImageId
properties.description: The AMI ID of the EC2 AMI in current region.

type.description: The AMI ID of the EC2 AMI in current region.

properties.name: ImageUri
properties.description: URI for containers created in current Region with default ECR image tag

type.description: URI for containers created in current Region with default ECR image tag
